## Overview

The goal of the [`communitybasedorgs`](https://github.com/tiernanmartin/communitybasedorgs) project is to better understand the "area of influence" of community-based organizations in the United States.

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# The package is only available on Github:
remotes::install_github("tiernanmartin/communitybasedorgs")

```
